key_5.name: Grateful Dead
key_5.set1: Cold Rain & Snow, Hell In A Bucket, Row Jimmy, Beat It On Down The Line, Promised Land, West L.A. Fadeaway, How Long Blues*, Gimme Some Lovin'*
key_5.set2:
Iko Iko, Monkey & The Engineer, Alabama Getaway, Dire Wolf, Cassidy, Memphis Blues, Drums# > The Other One > Stella Blue > Foolish Heart
E1: Not Fade Away
E2: Knockin' On Heaven's Door
key_5.comment:
* - w/ Spencer Davis On Guitar & Vocals # - w/ Kodo's Yoshikazu Fujimoto
Bob Dylan On Guitar & Vocals For Set 2 Except For Drums And The Encores

key_9.name: Grateful Dead
key_9.set1: Hell In A Bucket > Sugaree, Minglewood Blues, Peggy-O, Me & My Uncle > Big River, Loser, Victim Or The Crime, Standing On the Moon
key_9.set2:
Hey Pocky Way, Truckin' > Terrapin Station > Drums > Jam > I Will Take You Home > All Along The Watchtower > Morning Dew > Good Lovin'
E: Brokedown Palace

key_10.name: Grateful Dead
key_10.set1: Bill warms up, chats Bill - Picasso Moon Bill chats with sound engineers Bill warms up, chats Bill take 1 - Blow Away Bill take 2 - Blow Away Bill take 3 - Blow Away Bill take 4 - Blow Away Bill take 5 - Blow Away Jerry tells Bill - Blow Away Bill take 6 - Blow Away Bill take 7 - Blow Away Jerry, Bill chat - Blow Away
key_10.set2: Bob take 1 - Picasso Moon Bob brief break Bob take 2 - Picasso Moon Bob take 3 - Picasso Moon Bob take 4 - Picasso Moon Bob take 5 - Picasso Moon Bob take 6 - Picasso Moon Bob take 7 - Picasso Moon Bob take 8 - Picasso Moon Bob take 9 - Picasso Moon Bob stops
key_10.set3: Jerry warms up Phil & Jerry warm up (Phil & Jerry warm up) (1) Bob, Jerry & Brent warm up (2) take 1 - Just A Little Light chat & warm up take 2 - Just A Little Light chat Set IV: (Phil, Bob, Jerry and Brent listen) take 3 - Just A Little Light take 4 - Just A Little Light chat about next rehearsal Set V: (Jerry only) Jerry practices more Jerry - Adams Family theme Jerry - Mr. Ed - more practice take 5 - Just A Little Light (3) closing chat (1) Phil not on video, audio only (2) Brent not on video, audio only (3) Jerry only slideshow (not on audio releases since it is silent video - this is the only compilation on the video)
key_10.comment: This is NOT a compilation. It is: The View from Club Front - The Making of Built to Last. It is actual footage of members of the band practicing and laying down tracks individually and at times 2, 3 or 4 of them together. Video exists AND audio is also separate. Excellent quality SBD audio as well as good video! THIS ALL APPEARS TO BE SHOT/RECORDED THE SAME DAY (except for the ending silent slideshow). Video Exists!

Encore: Turn On Your Love Light
key_43.comment: Material from this show is featured in the video Downhill from Here Jerry Garcia - Guitar Bob Weir - Guitar Brent Mydland - Keyboards Phil Lesh - Bass Bill Kreutzmann - Drums Mickey Hart - Drums

key_76.name: Grateful Dead
key_76.venue: Ante Up - Built to Last interview
key_76.set1:
Interviews sprinkled in with the Built To Last LP.
1. Making the Album 4:04 2. Foolish Heart 1:16 into Foolish Heart 5:10 3. Built to Last :49 into Built to Last 5:03 4. Blow Away 1:14 into Blow Away 6:09 5. The Album Title :35 into Victim or the Crime 7:33 6. Standing on the Moon :53 into Standing on the Moon 5:20 7. We Can Run 1:08 into We Can Run 5:30 8. Picasso Moon 3:27 into Picasso Moon 6:40 9. I Will Take You Home :53 into I Will Take You Home 3:45 10. Success/Circus 4:36 11. Success II 4:00
key_76.comment:
Interviews sprinkled in with the Built To Last LP. Label-released promo CD.
1989 Promo - Produced by David Gans Interview by Bonnie Simmons and David Gans
